subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The title of best young third baseman has slipped, ever so slightly, from David Wright’s grasp this season. But on Thursday night, Wright offered a convincing reminder not to discard him from those ranks just yet.
snippet: The title of best young third baseman has slipped, ever so slightly, from David Wright’s grasp this season. But on Thursday night, Wright offered a convincing reminder not to discard him from those ranks just yet.
